Package de.aicard.services

Class CardService

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.services.CardService
@Service
public class CardService
extends java.lang.Object
handles finding, creating, deleting, and saving cards
Author:
Clemes Berger, Daniel Michel, Martin Kuehlborn

    • handleFileInput

      public java.lang.String handleFileInput​(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile fileInput, java.lang.String expectedType) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.IllegalStateException
      checks if input type matches input if correct, saves input file to cardFiles folder and return filename
      Parameters:
      fileInput - multipart file
      expectedType - expected filetype (image, video or audio)
      Returns:
      filename of saved input file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.IllegalStateException
